titleStmt.title: De finibus virtutis Christianæ The ends of Christian religion : which are to avoid eternall wrath from God, [to] enjoy [eternall] happinesse [from God] / justified in several discourses by R.S.
titleStmt.author: Sharrock, Robert, 1630-1684.
